docs.title: Welcome to the Graph Universe Documentation Page
What is the Graph Universe?
docs.text: The graph universe (guv) is a toolset to build a graph data model on top of a relational database model. The main component is a API server with the business logic. Other plugin and connector components can be used to integrate other technologies or extend the features. UI components makes the usage of the graph data user friendly. Client libraries can be used to integrate it into other systems for an hybrid approach.
